alert.note: Alert for Lower Plaquemines (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 1:31PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN PLAQUEMINES PARISH THROUGH 215 PM CDT... At 130 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a waterspout over Boothville-venice, or 23 miles southeast of Port Sulphur, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Waterspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Waterspouts can easily overturn boats and create locally hazardous waters. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Buras, Boothville-venice, Boothville, Buras-triumph, Venice, and Boothville Asos. WATERSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
